titles.title: 525 New Every Morning Is The Love (easy nice)

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
New ev'ry morning is the love
Our wak'ning and uprising prove
Thru sleep and darkness safely brought
Restored to life and pow'r and thought

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
New mercies each returning day
Hover around us while we pray
New perils past new sins forgiv'n
New thoughts of God
New hopes of heav'n

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
If on our daily course our mind
Be set to hallow all we find
New treasures still of countless price
God will provide for sacrifice

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
Old friends old scenes will lovelier be
As more of heav'n in each we see
Some soft'ing gleam of love and prayer
Shall dawn on every cross and care

verse.name: v5
verse.lines:
The trivial round the common task
Will furnish all we ought to ask
Room to deny ourselves a road
To bring us daily nearer God

verse.name: v6
verse.lines:
Only O Lord in Thy dear love
Fit us for perfect rest above
And help us this and every day
To live more nearly as we pray
